title.rendered: Wood Press Coconut Oil 250 ML Skin, Hair and Gut Health

content.rendered:
• Wood pressed coconut oil retains the natural nutrients. These are vitamins, and minerals. This makes it a nutritionally valuable choice.
  • Coconut oil has vitamin E and other elements. Vitamin E is a strong antioxidant that protects cells from free radical damage.
  • Wood pressed coconut oil is rich in natural antioxidants like phenolic compounds. These antioxidants protect the body from oxidative stress and free radicals, which can damage cells. By neutralizing these harmful molecules, wood pressed coconut oil supports overall health and well-being. Antioxidants reduce the risk of chronic diseases.
  • Wood pressed coconut oil contains healthy fatty acids like lauric acid that can promote heart health. Lauric acid raises HDL cholesterol, which lowers heart disease risk.

Benefits

  • Wood pressed coconut oil is beneficial for skin and hair care. Its moisturizing properties make it an excellent natural moisturizer.
  • Digestive Health
  • Immune System Support
  • Blood Sugar Regulation
  • Boosts Brain Function
  • Great for Oil Pulling & Can be Consumed Raw
  • Natural Flavour and Aroma

 Ingredients: Coconut Oil
